item.title: DJMIXX -STREETVISION RADIO AFTERWORK CLASSIC MASTERMIX -1
item.description: DJ MIXX BACK WITH STREETVISION RADIO AFTERWORK CLASSIC MIX BOY DID I LOVE WHEN DARRYL JAMES DID THIS ON 98.7KISS FM MIX AT SIX SHOUTS TO ALL THE CLASSIC CLUB JOINTS FROM BACK IN THE DAY LETS GET IT IN .......HELLO TO ROKISSY FM 104.9 EAST AFRICA KAMPALA UGANDA ON THE REBROADCAST LOVE HOW ALL AROUND THE WORLD PEOPLES ENJOY HEARING VARIETY OF MUSIC FROM NYC TO AFRICA ALL LOVE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!IM GOING TO POST AFTERWORK MASTERMIX 3-30-12 1-KLEER-INTIMATE CONNECTION 2-RUN-DMC-SUCKER MC'S-INST 3-ALEXANDER O'NEAL-YOU WERE MEANT TO BE MY LADY 4-KENNY DOPE-FEEL SO GOOD-DUBPLATE 5-B.B.D.-THOUGHT IT WAS ME 6-THE OJAYS-DARLING DARLING BABY 7-JOCELYN BROWN-LOVES GONNA GETCHA 8-ART OF NOISE-BEATBOX 9-CHRISTOPHER WILLIAMS-IF IM DREAMIN 10-THE JONES GIRLS-NIGHTS OVER EGYPT 11-GEORGE BENSON-GIVE ME THE NIGHT 12-BOBBY BYRD-I KNOW YOU GOT SOUL 13-KENNY DOPE -COME INSIDE-DUBPLATE 14-MAHOGANY-MASTERPIECE-DUB VERSION 15-CHAKA KHAN-MUSIC MAKES 16-TRUSSEL-LOVE INJECTION 17-FATBACK BAND-GOING HOME TO SEE MY BABY 18-JIMMY CASTOR BUNCH-WATCH ME NOW 19-THE EMOTIONS-BEST OF MY LOVE 20-PHYLISS HYMAN-YOU KNOW HOW TO LOVE ME 21-SISTER SLEDGE-LOST IN MUSIC 22-ALTON MCLAIN DESTINY-IT MUST BE LOVE- 23-CHANGE-GLOW OF LOVE 24-JON SECADA-JUST ANOTHER DAY-DUB VERSION
item.dc:creator: djmixxnewyork

1-KLEER-INTIMATE CONNECTION 2-RUN-DMC-SUCKER MC'S-INST 3-ALEXANDER O'NEAL-YOU WERE MEANT TO BE MY LADY 4-KENNY DOPE-FEEL SO GOOD-DUBPLATE 5-B.B.D.-THOUGHT IT WAS ME 6-THE OJAYS-DARLING DARLING BABY 7-JOCELYN BROWN-LOVES GONNA GETCHA 8-ART OF NOISE-BEATBOX 9-CHRISTOPHER WILLIAMS-IF IM DREAMIN 10-THE JONES GIRLS-NIGHTS OVER EGYPT 11-GEORGE BENSON-GIVE ME THE NIGHT 12-BOBBY BYRD-I KNOW YOU GOT SOUL 13-KENNY DOPE -COME INSIDE-DUBPLATE 14-MAHOGANY-MASTERPIECE-DUB VERSION 15-CHAKA KHAN-MUSIC MAKES 16-TRUSSEL-LOVE INJECTION 17-FATBACK BAND-GOING HOME TO SEE MY BABY 18-JIMMY CASTOR BUNCH-WATCH ME NOW 19-THE EMOTIONS-BEST OF MY LOVE 20-PHYLISS HYMAN-YOU KNOW HOW TO LOVE ME 21-SISTER SLEDGE-LOST IN MUSIC 22-ALTON MCLAIN DESTINY-IT MUST BE LOVE- 23-CHANGE-GLOW OF LOVE 24-JON SECADA-JUST ANOTHER DAY-DUB VERSION

item.title: STREETVISION RADIO THE SPRING CLASSICS 2012 VOL1
item.description:
DJMIXX  STREETVISION RADIO PRESENTS THE SPRING CLASSICS 2012 VOL1  FOR THE TRUE CLASSIC SOUL 80'S HEADS THAT LOVE THE VINTAGE CLASSIC MIXES HERE WE GO LOAD IT UP AND LETS ROLL OUT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!PART 2 THIS WEEK ....SHOUTS TO THE PODOMATIC NATION AND THE REBRODCAST ON 104.9FM DJROKISSY AND KAMPALA UGANDA 


SPRING CLASSICS 2012 VOLUME 1 PLAYLIST

1-kashif-help yourself to my love
2-lillo thomas-trust me
3-pam todd-family tree
4-the rolling stones-dance
5-ts monk -bon bon vie
6-bbq band-dreamer
7-vaughn manson-keep on grooving
8-melba moore-standing right there
9-melba moore-you stepped into my life-inst
10-ashford and simpson-stay free
11-evelyn king-your personal touch
12-ashford and simpson-street corner
13-thelma houston-you use to hold me
14-howard johnson-so fine
15-curtis hairston-i want you all tonight
16-narada walden-i shouldve loved ya
17-give it to me-TRAMPPS
18-tracy weber-sureshot
19-crown heights affair-atomsphere
20-shlamar-make that move
21-d train-youre the one for me

item.title: TOXIC BLENDS-4-CLASSIC SOUL EDITION -HOSTED BY J-DILLA AND THE STONES THROW ALLSTARS RIP
item.description: DJMIXX BACK WITH TOXIC BLENDS PART-4 THIS IS FOR TRUE BLEND LOVERS...REAL STORY J-DILLA 2006 I WAS CHILLING BACKSTAGE WITH HIM AND THE STONESTHROW CREW AND HE SAID TO ME HE LOVED BLEND DJ'S......SO WITH THE AUDIO ME AND DJ READYCEE CAPTURED I PRESENT, TOXIC BLENDS 4--HOSTED BY J-DILLA AND THE STONES THROW ALLSTARS ...RIP J-DILLA ...SHOUTS TO ALL THE BLEND DJ'S THAT GET DOWN LIKE THIS .....ENJOY THE FREE DOWNLOAD..SHOUTS TO THE PODOMATIC NATION STREETVISION TV THE READYCEE SHOW ..AND ALL BLEND LOVERS AROUND THE WORLD ...... TOXIC BLENDS-4-CLASSIC SOUL EDITION-HOSTED BY J-DILLA AND THE STONES THROW ALLSTARS RIP 1-DJMIXX /J DILLA INTRO 2-ON MY OWN/PATTI LABELLE/J-DILLA 3-YOU ARE MY LADY/FREDDIE JACKSON/J-DILLA 4-BABY COME TO ME /PATTI AUSTIN/J-DILLA 5-NITE AND DAY/AL B. SURE/J-DILLA 6-JUICY/MTUME/J-DILLA 7-CARAVAN OF LOVE/JASPER ISLEY/J-DILLA 8-ANY LOVE/LUTHER VANDROSS/J-DILLA 9-WALKING IN RHYTHM/THE BLACKBYRDS/PEACHFUZZ INST 10-ROCK WITH YOU/MICHAEL JACKSON/PARIS INST 11-BRAZILIAN RHYME/EARTH WIND FIRE/THE BREAKS INST 12-YOU CAN CALL ME CRAZY/GUY/IT TAKES 2 INST 13-SOMETHING JUST AINT RIGHT/KEITH SWEAT/SATURDAY INST 14-THIS KIND OF LOVE/NEW EDITION/FUNKY FOR YOU INST 15-MY CHRIE AMOUR/STEVIE WONDER/NY SHIT INST 16-WHATS GOING ON/MARVIN GAYE/RAEKWON INST 17-GONNA MAKE YOU MINE/LOOSE ENDS/BOOTLEG INST 18-YOUR BODYS CALLIN/R.KELLY/DEAD PRESIDENTS INST 19-LETS WAIT A WHILE/JANET JACKSON/BOOTLEG INST 20-HAPPY/SURFACE/GANGSTAR INST 21-DONT LOOK ANY FURTHER/DENNIS EDWARDS/45 KING INST 22-NOTHING CAN COME BETWEEN US/SADE/BOOTLEG INST 23-CAUGHT UP IN THE RAPTURE/ANITA BAKER/DIAMOND D INST 24-BACK TO LIFE/SOUL TO SOUL/BOOTLEG INST 25-UPSIDE DOWN/DIANA ROSS/BOOTLEG INST 26-DONT WALK AWAY/JADE/BOOTLEG INST 27-TREAT YOU RIGHT/ANGELA WINBUSH/BOOTLEG INST 28-DJ MIXX OUTRO

item.title: Soulful House Journey -NEW DEEP HOUSE
item.description: DJMIXX BACK WITH Soulful House Journey A LOOK INTO THE CURRENT DEEP SPIRITUAL HOUSE TRAXXS THAT GO TO THE SOUL PERFECT WORK OUT CD OR RIGHT BEFORE YOU GO TO THE CLUB........2012 IM GOING BACK TO MY HOUSE ROOTS ....SHOUTS TO THE FOLLOWING DEEP HOUSE PARTIES..... 718 SESSIONS-THIS IS MY DJ TEACHER DANNY KRIVIT TONY TOUCH FUNK BOX -SHOUTS TO PAPA JUST HOUSE FACEBOOK FOR THE POSTS Soulful House Journey----PLAYLIST-NO PARTICULAR ORDER Cajmere feat. Dajae, Brighter Days 2011 Remixes Larry's Jam - Larry's Jam (Original Mix) Satisfy (Booker T Main Mix) All Organic EP - Organic Back 2 My Future - Back 2 My Future (Groove Assassin Remix) 1 Into My Soul (Rocco & Spiritchaser Remixes) - At The Club - At The Club (Rocco Deep Mix) Bring It Back (Original Mix) 320K 12/30/2011 16:51 (CDT) Running For Nothing - Running For Nothing (Seb Skalski Mix) Need Your Love - Need Your Love (Need Your Love) Into A Deep - Into A Deep (Hot Toddy Remix) Summer Just Can't Wave Goodbye (Vocal 5am) Revival (Souldynamic Go Deep Mix) Papa Records & Reel People Music In My Lifetime (Danny Krivit Edit) The MuthaFunkaz, Don't Worry (About Your Problems) (Original Mix) NYC Peech Boys, Michael Watford, Massimo Gabba, Tyron Dixon, Selections 1 Im So Thankful (Main Mix) Barbara Tucker, SuSu Bobien, Wipe The Needle, Audio Instinct, Selections 2 Care Free (Sean McCabe Mix)

item.title: THE CHRONICLES -DEEP FUSION PT 1-NEW DEEP HOUSE
item.description: LETS TAKE IT TO THE DEEP HOUSE SECTOR DJMIXX GOING IN ON ALL THE NEWEST DOPE UNDERGROUND DEEP HOUSE SHOUTS TO ALL THE SHELTER SOUND FACTORY BAR ROOTS NYC CROWD TONY TOUCH FUNKBOX CREW AND ALL HOUSE LOVERS AROUND THE WORLD I WILL HAVE MONTHLY UPDATES ON THIS ........ DEEP FUSION PART ONE -NEW DEEP HOUSE DEC 2011 MAKE IT LAST-DIMITRI MAX DONT STOP-MIGUEL MIGS F-AYA HEARTACHE-SHIMMA-ORIGINAL MIX RUNNIN-SU SU BOBIEN TRY ME -MARGARET GRACE-TEDDY MIX LA VIDA GOZA-GOMEZ AND FRESCO-LOUIE DEEP MIX BUTTERFLY-ALEXANDER FOG DEEP FUSION-JOHN KNIGHT TALKIN SHHH-JOVONN DEEPER AND DEEPER-THE FUNKLOVERS KEEP DOIN IT -SCOTT DIAZ I TRUST YOU-ASSURANCE FANATIC-PSALM 143-ORIGINAL VERSION PLASTIC DREAMS 2011-RMX-JAYDEE UGLY PART OF ME -AVERY SUNSHINE JUST A LIL BIT -SEAN MCABE STEPHANIE COOK DEEPER IN LOVE-BOBBY STEVE F-BARBARA TUCKER

item.title: STREETVISION RADIO PRESENTS -GROWN FOLK CLASSICS VOL 1
item.description: As we wind down the summer im on a classic trip like never before seems the beat is just so different than what we have today so heres my new series just for the 30-55 age folks that like dope old school jams ....PODOMATIC NATION STAND UP RIP TO NICK ASHFORD OF ASHFORD&SIMPSON THIS MIX IS DEDICATED TO YOUR MEMORY AND THE LEGACY OF MUSIC YOU LEAVE BEHIND VALERIE HOLD YA HEAD WE FEEL YOUR PAIN............. GROWN FOLK CLASSICS PLAYLIST 1-ASHFORD &SIMPSON-STAY FREE 2-EVELYN KING-YOUR PERSONAL TOUCH 3-THE ROLLING STONES-MISS YOU 4-THE BROTHERS JOHNSON-BROTHERS GONNA WORK IT OUT 5-ASHFORD &SIMPSON-STREET CORNER 6-THE MAIN INGREDIENT-WALKING IN RHYTHM 7-NARADA WALDEN-SHOULDVE LOVED YA 8-CHANGE-HOLD TIGHT 9-CHANGE-PARADISE 10-MFSB-LOVE IS THE MESSAGE 11-CROWN HEIGHTS AFFAIR-ATMOSPHERE STRUT 12-DHARA BRAXTON-JUMPBACK 13-SHALAMAR-MAKE THAT MOVE 14-ASHFORD&SIMPSON-OUT OF THIS WORLD 15-HALL AND OATES-CANT GO FOR THAT 16-SYLVIA STRIPLIN-GIVE ME YOUR LOVE 17-ASHFORD&SIMPSON-STAY FREE-DOUBLE PLAY

item.title: STREETVISION RADIO-SPRING CLASSICS PT 1
item.description:
DJ MIXX BACK WITH THE SPRING CLASSICS EDITION NOTHING BUT THE RAW CLASSICS FOR THE MENTAL PERFECT FOR ROLLING IN THE WHIP WITH YOUR SHORTY LETS DO IT!!!!!!

 

SPRING CLASSICS PLAYLIST

1-KENNY DOPE/GET DOWN

2-SOUL TO SOUL/MISSING YOU

3-CRUSADERS/STREETLIFE/JAZZ REMIX

4-SISTER SLEDGE/THINKING OF YOU

5-GEORGE BENSON/TURN YOUR LOVE AROUND

6-PRINCESS/SAY IM YOUR #1/IMPORT MIX

7-JEAN CARNE/DONT LET IT GO TO YOUR HEAD

8-TIMEX SOCIAL CLUB/RUMORS

9-DIANA ROSS/UPSIDE DOWN

10-SHALAMAR/ A NIGHT TO REMEMBER

11-ROY AYERS/IM YOUR MIND PT 2 

12-TENNA MARIE/I NEED YOUR LOVIN

13-IN DEEP/LAST NIGHT A DJ SAVED MY LIFE

14-JERMAINE JACKSON/LETS GET SERIOUS

15-TRUSSEL/LOVE INJECTION

16-MAHOGANY/RIDE ON THE RHYTHM

17-HOWARD JOHNSON/SO FINE

18-FRANCE JOLI/GONNA GET OVER YOU

19-KELLIE PATTERSON/TUN OFF THE LIGHTS

20-I LEVEL/GIVE ME

21-KAREN YOUNG/SURESHOT

22-LOVE UNLIMITED ORCHESTRA/HEY LOOK AT ME IM IN LOVE

23-BARRY WHITE-YOUR SWEETNESS IS MY WEAKNESS

24-ALEXANDER ONEAL & CHERELLE/SATURDAY LOVE

25-ULTRA NATE/ITS OVER NOW/TONY H. MIX

item.title: THE CHRONICLES-FEB 2011 -DJMIXX AND DJ SNUU-REGGAE CHRONICLES
item.description: We are back this week with a special reggae blend thats crazy DJ MIXX and DJ SNUU, stops by with the mad reggae sound for the true reggae heads this is a must have WE ROCKED NELLS NIGHTCLUB IN 2001 WITH THIS EXACT SOUND AND BLEND LETS GOOOOO ..DJMIXX rocks dope reggae with hip hop beats all thru his set, and DJ SNUU brings the crazy riddim mix with the crazy classics vybes too make sure you pass this along and spread the download......TOP 20 FEB 2011 THIS WEEK AND A BRAND NEW MIXX WITH DJREADYCEE AND DJ MIXX AT DJREADYCEE.COM...... .....SHOUTS TO THE PODOMATIC NATION AND BEJING CHINA FOR ALL THE DOWNLOADS I SEE YOU AND THE REST OF THE WORLD BIG UP................... REGGAE CHRONICLES PLAYLIST DJ-MIXX-TOXIC REGGAE BLENDS 1-SOUND BOY KILLING/MEGA BANTON/MAD SKIILZ LARGE PRO INST 1995 2-CANN DUNNE/SHABBA RANS/DJ SPINNA INST 3-KIMBO KING/REGGIE STEPPER/RIKERS ISLAND INST/KOOL G RAP 4-TRAFFIC BLOCKING/GENERAL DEGREE/GET FUNKY/45KING INST 5-HUMAN NATURE/MICHAEL JACKSON/BLEND/FROM TOXIC-4 6-ON MY OWN/PATTI LABELLE/BLEND/FROM TOXIC-4 7-MEMORIES/BEENIE MAN/A MILLION/JAY Z INST/BIG L INST 8-POSE OFF/REDD FOXX/THEM THATS NOT/GRAP LUVA INST 9-HOT THIS YEAR/SUPERCAT/DJ WES-REAL HIP HOP INST 10-TIGHT SKIRT/RED RAT/SYMPHONY INST 11-BUCKSHOT RIDDIM RMX/BOUNTY KILLER/OLD SCHOOL INSTS 12-REAL LOVER/MAD LION/HIP HOP REMIX/SLOW DOWN/BRAND NUBIAN/INST 13-TOUR/CAPELTON/HIP HOP REMIX 14-BIG UP/RAYVON & SHAGGY/FIND THAT/BEATNUTS INST 15-VICIOUS/RMX/LIL VICIOUS AND SHYHEIM/PINK COOKIES INST 13- ######################################################## DJ SNUU-THE BUTCHER-RIDDIMS BLAST 1-Bum Flick-(Little Lenny) 2-Yu Man Want Yu-(Chrome Nine) 3-Combination Mix-(Ricky General & Mega Banton) 4-Passport Buddy-(Risto Benji) 5-I'm Not Sure Anymore-(Supper Cat) 6-Granny-(Papa San) 7-Granny a lover-(Capleton) 8-Poco Man jam-(Gregory Peck) 9-Old Veteran-(Supper Cat) 10-Rich Girl-(Louchie Lou & Michie One) 11-Shot Batty Boy-(Top Cat) 12-Pressure Dem-(Ricky General) 13-Things A Gwan-(Spragga Benz) 14-Wha Wha-(Frankie Sly) 15-Wackie News-(Frisco Kid) 16-Matey-(Peny Irie) 17-Dem Bow-(Sabba Ranks) 18-kill The Bitch-(Sasha) 19-Burrup-(Nardo Ranks) 20-Zunga Zeng-(Yelloman) 21-Golden Hen-(Tenor Saw) 22-Here I Come-(Barrington Levy) 23-Drum Pan Sound-(Reggie Stepp) 24-Bonafide Love-(Buju Banton feat wayne wonder)

DJ-MIXX-TOXIC REGGAE BLENDS 1-SOUND BOY KILLING/MEGA BANTON/MAD SKIILZ LARGE PRO INST 1995 2-CANN DUNNE/SHABBA RANS/DJ SPINNA INST 3-KIMBO KING/REGGIE STEPPER/RIKERS ISLAND INST/KOOL G RAP 4-TRAFFIC BLOCKING/GENERAL DEGREE/GET FUNKY/45KING INST 5-HUMAN NATURE/MICHAEL JACKSON/BLEND/FROM TOXIC-4 6-ON MY OWN/PATTI LABELLE/BLEND/FROM TOXIC-4 7-MEMORIES/BEENIE MAN/A MILLION/JAY Z INST/BIG L INST 8-POSE OFF/REDD FOXX/THEM THATS NOT/GRAP LUVA INST 9-HOT THIS YEAR/SUPERCAT/DJ WES-REAL HIP HOP INST 10-TIGHT SKIRT/RED RAT/SYMPHONY INST 11-BUCKSHOT RIDDIM RMX/BOUNTY KILLER/OLD SCHOOL INSTS 12-REAL LOVER/MAD LION/HIP HOP REMIX/SLOW DOWN/BRAND NUBIAN/INST 13-TOUR/CAPELTON/HIP HOP REMIX 14-BIG UP/RAYVON & SHAGGY/FIND THAT/BEATNUTS INST 15-VICIOUS/RMX/LIL VICIOUS AND SHYHEIM/PINK COOKIES INST 13- ######################################################## DJ SNUU-THE BUTCHER-RIDDIMS BLAST
1-Bum Flick-(Little Lenny) 2-Yu Man Want Yu-(Chrome Nine) 3-Combination Mix-(Ricky General & Mega Banton) 4-Passport Buddy-(Risto Benji) 5-I'm Not Sure Anymore-(Supper Cat) 6-Granny-(Papa San) 7-Granny a lover-(Capleton) 8-Poco Man jam-(Gregory Peck) 9-Old Veteran-(Supper Cat) 10-Rich Girl-(Louchie Lou & Michie One) 11-Shot Batty Boy-(Top Cat) 12-Pressure Dem-(Ricky General) 13-Things A Gwan-(Spragga Benz) 14-Wha Wha-(Frankie Sly) 15-Wackie News-(Frisco Kid) 16-Matey-(Peny Irie) 17-Dem Bow-(Sabba Ranks) 18-kill The Bitch-(Sasha) 19-Burrup-(Nardo Ranks) 20-Zunga Zeng-(Yelloman) 21-Golden Hen-(Tenor Saw) 22-Here I Come-(Barrington Levy) 23-Drum Pan Sound-(Reggie Stepp) 24-Bonafide Love-(Buju Banton feat wayne wonder)

item.title: FALLBACK CLASSICS #5 REGGAE MADNESS-HOSTED BY DREAD THE CREEPER

DJMIXX BACK WITH THE LAST EDITION OF THE " FALLBACK CLASSICS SERIES ENJOY SHOUTS TO THE READY CEE SHOW, THE MOMO SHOW AND THE CHRONICLES RADIO SHOW WE ARE BACK HARDBODY STRAIGHT FROM THE BRON NYC REPPPIN FOR THE STREETS THIS TIME WE GOING IN FOR THE TRUE DREAD HEADS THAT LOVE DANCEHALL REGGAE LETS RIDE OUT

item.description: DJMIXX-THE ONE ARM BANDIT.... im back with Fallback Classics for the serious classic heads out there im dropping 5 volumes of this stay tuned GOING BACK TO THE ROOTS SEASONS CHANGING LETS GO PODOMATIC NATION............ALSO TOXIC 3 BLENDS IN HERE TOO CHECK IT OUT...... item.title: THE CHRONICLES-TOXIC BLENDS PT. 3 -90'S HIP HOP
item.description: DJ Mixx back with my new mix-cd about to hit the streets of NYC Monday....COVER MONDAY ... this is another installment of the Toxic Blends series PT..3...PT 2 IS ALSO UP ON THE PAGE... which are classic blends from classic hip hop artists this one is straight gutter and as always i give it to the podomatic nation as always.....thanks for the many appreciated downloads, from all over the globe, special shouts to Bejing and USA Milano, Spain, Canada, Australia, Afghanistan, Europe, and the entire world.....KEEP IT FROZEN.........THE CHRONICLES 2009-------- SPECIAL SHOUTS TO ALL THE REAL DJ'S PUTTING IN WORK ON THE SET GIVING IT THE RESPECT IT DESERVES AND THE BLEND DJ'S THAT TWIST THE MUSIC UP FOR THE PEOPLE KEEP ROCKING HIP HOP 4EVER....DJMIXX Check me out on thereadyceeshow.com weekly with the "BAG OF FUNK" MIX dropping the new gutter undergound hip hop. STAY TUNED SOON FOR all new season of READYCEE TV AND NEW EPISODES OF THE READYCEE SHOW....FEATURING DJMIXX...THE ONE ARM BANDIT NYC TOXIC 3 PLAYLIST 1-DJ MIXX -J-DILLA INTRO 2-CNN-DIRTY MONEY B/W-GETO BOYS-MY MIND IS PLAYING TRICKS ON ME 3-HEAVY-D TUPAC GRAND PUBA AND BIGGIE-LETS GET IT ON B/W-DIALATED PEOPLES 4-3RD BASS-DERILECT OF DIALECT-B/W/GANGSTAR-MASS APPEAL 5-CYPRESS HILL F-REDMAN& ERIC SERMON-THROW YOUR HANDS-B/W-GANGSTAR- 6-NAS-WE WILL SURVIVE-B/W-MARLEY MARL-DA BRIDGE 7-MOS DEF-F-BUSHBABIES-LOVE SONG-B/W-REDMAN-CANT WAIT 8-GRAND PUBA-I LIKE IT-B/W-REDMAN-BLOW MY MIND-RMX- 9-Q-TIP-F-BUSTA RHYMES-FOR THE NASTY-B/W-TRIBE CALLED QUEST-SCENARIO- 10-KEITH MURRAY, ERIC SERMON&REDMAN-THE GAME-B/W-DIAMOND D-YOU CANT 11-SKILLZPHILLY-FREESTYLE-B/WKRS-ONE-MC'S ACT LIKE THEY DONT KNOW 12-REDMAN&METHOD MAN-TEAR DA ROOF-B/W-9TH WONDER 13-A-ONE-DEDICATED-B/W-MOS DEF-MS FAT BOOTY 14-BIZ MARKIE-STUDDA STEP-B/W-DELA-MY NIGGA 15-BLACK THOUGHT&COMMON-HURRICANE-B/W-DIAMOND D -THE LIGHT 16-LORDS OF THE UNDERGROUND-WHAT IM AFTER-B/W-GURU-RESPECT 17-CONSEQENCE-OUE ANTHER E.N.S-B/W-RUN-DMC-DOWN WITH THE KING 18-MOS DEF-MS FAT BOOTY-B/W-DELA-TIME TO CHILL 19-DAS EFX-MICROPHONE MASTER-B/W-PETE ROCK- 20-BLAHZAY-DANGER-B/W-9TH WONDER-BEAT 6 21-GANGSTARR-JUST TO GET REP/KOOL G RAP-ON THE RUN-B/W-MOBB DEEP-GOODS 22-PUBLIC ENEMY-THE REBEL-B/W-MOBB DEEP-AIGHT 23-NATURE-F-NAS-THE ULTIMATE HIGH-B/W-KRS-ONE 24-SNNOP DOGG-AINT NO FUN-B/W-DIAMOND D- 25-MAIN SOURCE-FAKIN THE FUNK-B/W-DIAMOND D 26-DR DRE-F-SNOOP-NOTHIN BUT A G-THING/NOW YOURE MINE-LARGE 27-MOBB DEEP-SHOOK ONES-B/W-J-DILLA-INSPIRE 28-DJ MIXX OUTRO

item.title: Feb 2, 2009-The Chronicles Radio Show-----TOXIC BLENDS -CLASSIC HIP HOP BLENDS
item.description: DJ MIXX.....Back at it 2009, missed the podcast the hiatus is over, pardon the stretch, im back with the funk,shouts to my crew,we coming hard this year right here on the chronicles. Special gift for my hiatus, my new mix-cd that hits the street this week, i got it first for the podomatic nation,... IM GOING FOR THE BLENDS AWARD 2009 LOOK FOR THAT..REAL TALK......thanks for the still record number downloads for the show even with the hiatus...... Check me out also on thereadyceeshow.com.....HIP HOP'S ILLEST PODCAST WEEKLY......with DJ READYCEE AND DJMIXX WITH "THE BAG OF FUNK MIX AND " THE REST OF THE CREW...MR XHATICS& KILLA KAL ........SHOUTS TO PETER O& LIVE N DIRECT 2009....CHECK wemakeconcerts.com for the NEW show ....coming Feb 14, 2009...DJMIXX IN THE HOUSE....... .............NOW LETS DOWNLOAD THE FUNK.............. SHOUTS TO BEJING,ALL OF CHINA, AUSTRALIA, UNITED STATES,EUROPE,JAPAN, MONTREAL,..AND ALL OVER THE WORLD ...DJMIXX..I DO IT FOR YOU..... "MIX IT RIGHT PRODUCTIONS"......FOREVER........rip johnny jewelz
